title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.15 - Stamping of low pressure boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.15 - Stamping of low pressure boilers

State Regulations

All low pressure boilers shall be built in accordance
with ASME requirements by a manufacturer who is in possession of an "H" code
symbol stamp and a valid certificate of authorization. Each boiler shall be
stamped with the "H" code symbol as shown below: Image

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-1.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
